title: Pulsefire Caitlyn?!
body: I neeedsssss where is she in my shop my wallet is prepared riot stop teasing! Im throwing money at my screen....

replies.body: She'll be out a bit later this patch! Unfortunately, I'm not able to give an exact date!
dang they said she would come out 7.10 T_T
Yup, we're in 7.10, but content doesn't always unlock the first day(s) of the patch.
sooo we cant expect the skin to come out this week?
It can come out between now and the 29th.
you guys really love to keep us on tenterhooks
still no pulsefire skin? where rito where............ i was hoping today she'd be released i dont see why hold out so long...

Graves can have a cigar but i can't have my skin.

IT'S TIME TO STOP.
Most likely she'll be released next week since they've put out the shop (though having issues currently) and the next set of Chromas today.  I'd say look around Tuesday or Thursday.
